title: Spicy Chicken Rice Bowl
steps: Dice chicken breast into bite-sized pieces.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté minced garlic and ginger until fragrant.
Add chicken, cook until browned, then stir in soy sauce and chili flakes.
Serve chicken over warm cooked rice and sprinkle with sliced spring onion.

title: Lemon Herb Chicken with Roasted Vegetables
steps: Preheat oven to 200°C.
Toss chopped vegetables with olive oil, salt and pepper on a baking tray.
Mix lemon juice, minced garlic and thyme, coat chicken thighs with the mixture and place on top of vegetables.
Roast for 30–35 minutes until chicken is cooked through and vegetables are tender.

title: Creamy Mushroom Pasta
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté diced onion and sliced mushrooms in butter until browned.
Add minced garlic, cook briefly, then pour in cream and simmer until slightly thickened.
Stir in cooked pasta and grated parmesan, season with pepper and garnish with chopped parsley.

title: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
steps: Rinse and drain chickpeas.
Chop cucumber, tomatoes and red onion into small pieces.
Whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt and pepper.
Combine vegetables and chickpeas, toss with dressing and crumble feta on top.

title: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
steps: Whisk soy sauce, water, brown sugar and cornstarch to make a sauce.
Stir-fry beef strips in hot oil until browned, then remove from pan.
Add broccoli, garlic and ginger to the pan and cook until broccoli is bright green and tender-crisp.
Return beef to the pan, pour in sauce and cook until thickened.

title: Vegetable Fried Rice
steps: Scramble egg in a hot oiled pan, then remove and set aside.
Add diced carrots and peas to the pan and cook until tender.
Stir in cooked rice, soy sauce and sesame oil and fry for a few minutes.
Add chopped spring onion and scrambled egg back to the pan and mix well.

title: Tomato Basil Soup
steps: Sauté chopped onion and minced garlic in olive oil until soft.
Add canned tomatoes and vegetable broth, bring to a simmer for 15 minutes.
Blend the soup until smooth, then stir in chopped basil and a splash of cream.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

title: Baked Salmon with Dill Potatoes
steps: Preheat oven to 200°C.
Toss halved baby potatoes with olive oil, salt and pepper, roast for 20 minutes.
Place salmon on the tray, season with salt, pepper, lemon slices and chopped dill, then bake another 10–12 minutes.
Serve salmon with roasted potatoes and extra lemon wedges.

title: Tofu Peanut Stir-Fry
steps: Press tofu to remove excess moisture, then cut into cubes.
Whisk soy sauce, peanut butter, minced garlic and ginger with a bit of water to make a sauce.
Stir-fry tofu in oil until golden, then add sliced vegetables.
Pour in sauce and cook until vegetables are tender and sauce thickens, sprinkle with peanuts before serving.

title: Red Lentil Coconut Curry
steps: Rinse red lentils under cold water.
Sauté chopped onion, garlic and ginger in oil until soft, then stir in curry powder and tomato paste.
Add lentils, coconut milk and vegetable broth, simmer 15–20 minutes until lentils are tender.
Stir in spinach until wilted and season with salt to taste.

title: Spinach Scrambled Eggs
steps: Whisk eggs with a splash of milk, salt and pepper.
Melt butter in a pan and sauté spinach until wilted.
Pour egg mixture over spinach and cook gently, stirring, until softly set.

title: Overnight Berry Oats
steps: Combine oats, milk, yogurt, chia seeds and honey in a jar.
Stir well, then top with berries.
Refrigerate overnight and eat cold in the morning.

title: Turkey Bean Chili
steps: Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in oil until soft.
Add ground turkey and cook until browned.
Stir in tomato sauce, drained beans, chili powder and cumin.
Simmer 20–30 minutes, then season with salt and pepper.

title: Garlic Shrimp Pasta
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté minced garlic and chili flakes in olive oil, then add shrimp and cook until pink.
Toss cooked pasta with shrimp, lemon juice and chopped parsley.
Season with salt and pepper.

title: Margherita Flatbread Pizza
steps: Preheat oven to 220°C.
Spread tomato sauce over flatbread and top with sliced mozzarella and halved cherry tomatoes.
Bake 8–10 minutes until cheese is melted and edges are crisp.
Top with fresh basil, drizzle of olive oil, salt and pepper.

title: Greek Yogurt Parfait
steps: Layer yogurt, granola and berries in a glass.
Drizzle with honey and sprinkle with chopped nuts.
Serve immediately or chill briefly.

title: Roasted Veggie Quinoa Bowl
steps: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Toss diced sweet potato, broccoli florets and sliced red onion with olive oil, salt and pepper, then roast at 200°C until tender.
Serve roasted vegetables over quinoa, squeeze lemon on top and crumble feta cheese over the bowl.

title: Chicken Fajita Bowl
steps: Cook rice according to package instructions.
Slice chicken, peppers and onion into strips.
Sauté chicken in oil with fajita seasoning until cooked, then add vegetables and cook until softened.
Serve over rice with lime juice and chopped cilantro.

title: Black Bean Tacos
steps: Sauté chopped onion and minced garlic until soft.
Add drained black beans, cumin and chili powder, cook until heated through and lightly mash.
Fill taco shells with bean mixture, shredded lettuce, diced tomato and cheese.

title: Teriyaki Salmon Rice Bowl
steps: Cook rice according to package instructions.
Mix soy sauce, brown sugar, minced garlic and ginger to make teriyaki sauce.
Bake or pan-sear salmon while brushing with sauce until cooked and glazed.
Serve salmon over rice with extra sauce, sliced spring onion and sesame seeds.

title: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
steps: Add banana, peanut butter, milk, yogurt, honey and ice cubes to a blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Serve immediately.

title: Pesto Pasta with Cherry Tomatoes
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Halve cherry tomatoes and sauté briefly in olive oil.
Toss hot pasta with pesto and tomatoes.
Top with grated parmesan, salt and pepper.

title: Cauliflower Chickpea Traybake
steps: Preheat oven to 200°C.
Toss cauliflower, drained chickpeas and sliced red onion with olive oil, paprika, cumin, salt and pepper.
Spread on a baking tray and roast 25–30 minutes until golden.
Garnish with chopped parsley before serving.

title: Thai Basil Chicken
steps: Cook rice according to package instructions.
Sauté minced garlic and chopped chili in oil, then add ground chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in soy sauce, fish sauce and a pinch of sugar, cook a few more minutes.
Turn off heat and fold in fresh basil leaves until wilted.

title: Shakshuka
steps: Sauté chopped onion, bell pepper and garlic in olive oil until soft.
Add canned tomatoes, paprika and cumin, simmer 10–15 minutes.
Make small wells in the sauce and crack eggs into them.
Cover and cook until eggs are set to your liking, then garnish with parsley.

title: Mushroom Risotto
steps: Heat broth in a pot and keep warm.
Sauté chopped onion and sliced mushrooms in olive oil and butter until softened, then add minced garlic.
Stir in rice and toast for 1–2 minutes, then pour in white wine and cook until absorbed.
Add warm broth a ladle at a time, stirring until absorbed before adding more, until rice is creamy and al dente.
Stir in grated parmesan, salt and pepper to taste.

title: Chicken Noodle Soup
steps: Sauté chopped onion, carrots, celery and garlic in a pot until softened.
Add chicken breast, broth and bay leaf, bring to a simmer until chicken is cooked.
Remove chicken, shred, then return to the pot with egg noodles.
Simmer until noodles are tender, then season with salt, pepper and parsley.

title: Cheese and Veggie Omelette
steps: Whisk eggs with milk, salt and pepper.
Sauté diced bell pepper and spinach in butter until softened.
Pour egg mixture into pan, cook until almost set, then sprinkle with cheese and fold.
Cook briefly until cheese melts.

title: Falafel Wrap with Tahini Sauce
steps: Whisk tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, water and salt into a smooth sauce.
Warm flatbreads and cook or heat falafel according to package or recipe.
Fill flatbreads with lettuce, sliced tomato, cucumber, red onion and falafel.
Drizzle with tahini sauce and wrap.

title: Apple Cinnamon Oatmeal
steps: Dice apple into small cubes.
Bring milk or water with a pinch of salt to a simmer, then add oats and apple.
Cook, stirring, until oats are creamy and apple is tender.
Stir in cinnamon and honey, then top with chopped nuts.
